GIVE_DESCRIPTION: Directly gives a card to another player after confirmation
SLASH_DESC: Select the user you want to give a card to
SLASH_DESC2: Enter the code of the card that you want to give away
NO_SELF_GIVE: {{author}} You cannot give a card to yourself
MEM_QUARANTINED: {{author}} That user is quarantined. Visit our [Guide](<https://guide.sofi.gg/user-status#quarantined>) for detailed information about the quarantined status.
MEM_TRADE_LOCKED: {{author}} That user is trade locked. Visit our [Guide](<https://guide.sofi.gg/user-status#trade-locked>) for detailed information about the trade locked status.
AUTHOR_QUARANTINED: {{author}} You are quarantined. Visit our [Guide](<https://guide.sofi.gg/user-status#quarantined>) for detailed information about the quarantined status.
AUTHOR_TRADE_LOCKED: {{author}} You are trade locked. Visit our [Guide](<https://guide.sofi.gg/user-status#trade-locked>) for detailed information about the trade locked status.
NO_CARD_FOUND: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
CARD_CANNOT_GIVE: {{author}}, That card cannot be transferred to another person.
CARD_SELECTED: {{author}} That card is used in a deck and cannot be transferred
CARD_LOCKED: {{author}} That card is locked and cannot be given away. Use the command `{{prefix}}ut <CardCode>` to unlock the card
CARD_IN_QUEST: {{author}} That card is currently used in a quest and cannot be given away
GIVE_EXTRA_INFO: This command will send a give request to another player you have selected. Once both sides have accepted the give, the card will be added to their collection
